parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Nominative 2nd Person Singular
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 2nd Person Singular
str2: Answer, bid, bring word, command. A primary verb; to speak or say.
Of Hebrew origin; Jesus, the name of our Lord and two other Israelites.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: (a) I say, speak; I mean, mention, tell, (b) I call, name, especially in the pass., (c) I tell, command.
However, nevertheless, but, except that, yet. From pleion; moreover, i.e. Albeit, save that, rather, yet.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 1st Person Singular
str2: (a) I say, speak; I mean, mention, tell, (b) I call, name, especially in the pass., (c) I tell, command.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Dative 2nd Person Plural
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.
From, away from. A primary particle; 'off, ' i.e. Away, in various senses.
Now, just now, at this moment. Adverb from a derivative of airo through the idea of suspension; just now.

parse: Verb - Future Indicative Middle - 2nd Person Plural
str2: Properly, to stare at, i.e. to discern clearly; by extension, to attend to; by Hebraism, to experience; passively, to appear.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
A son, descendent. Apparently a primary word; a 'son', used very widely of immediate, remote or figuratively, kinship.
A man, one of the human race. From aner and ops; man-faced, i.e. A human being.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Middle or Passive - Accusative Masculine Singular
str2: To sit, be seated, enthroned; I dwell, reside. From kata; and hemai; to sit down; figuratively, to remain, reside.
From out, out from among, from, suggesting from the interior outwards. A primary preposition denoting origin, from, out.
On the right hand, right hand, right. From dechomai; the right side or hand.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
From dunamai; force; specially, miraculous power.
And, even, also, namely.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Middle or Passive - Accusative Masculine Singular
str2: To come, go.
On, to, against, on the basis of, at.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
A cloud. From nephos; properly, cloudiness, i.e. a cloud.
Perhaps from the same as oros; the sky; by extension, heaven; by implication, happiness, power, eternity; specially, the Gospel.
